meanings.definition: A person who makes or sells pewter items.
meanings.sent1: The pewterers crafted beautiful mugs and plates.
meanings.sent2: The town had many pewterers who sold their wares at the market.
meanings.sent3: The pewterers had a competition to see who could make the shiniest cup.
meanings.sent4: In the world of artisans, the pewterers were the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The pewterers' workshop was filled with the sweet smell of molten metal.

meanings.sent1: We visited the pewterers to see their latest creations.
meanings.sent2: The pewterers in the shop were busy hammering away at their work.
meanings.sent3: The group of pewterers decided to form a band in their free time.
meanings.sent4: The pewterers stood out in the crowd with their unique style.
meanings.sent5: The pewterers' hands were stained with the marks of their craft.
